name: oow
description:
OOW

My gmtk game jam 2019 submission. It's all about the only one.

You venture across a world cursed by the wicked mage. The curse of onlyness has altered many aspects of life, can you win against him? Or will his tricks lure you into his trap?

Control with WASD to move and Space to advance dialogue.

Made with Haxe, Heaps, Tiled and Vim.
